title: [RESOLVED] Login Issues - 4th Feb 2016
body:
**Update - 10:30am AEDT**
We've managed to fix the service that was causing issues, and it looks like our platform has recovered.  We're seeing players are able to log in and start games again, and we're confident that the issue is resolved.


**Update - 10:10am AEDT**
Our engineering teams are still working to identify the root cause of this issue, working through possible options.   Unfortunately we don't yet have an ETA on when we'll return to service, but I'll make sure to keep you updated here.


**Original Post**

Hi folks,

We're aware of some issues preventing players from logging in at this time.  We're working on it and I'll put an update in this thread asap. 

Sorry for the inconvenience - we'll have you back on the rift ASAP!

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Does this have something to do wit TPPA protests or is this a mistake by Riot?

how would it though? o_o
